Abstract: In her monthly letter, WSJ. Magazine’s editor in chief takes readers through the highlights of February 2020
Title: Court Backs Florida Governor on Restrictions for Felon Voters
Url: https://www.wsj.com/articles/court-backs-florida-governor-on-restrictions-for-felon-voters-11579212509
Abstract: The Florida Supreme Court said in an advisory opinion that the state’s 2018 amendment restoring voting rights to about 1.4 million people with felony records would require them to pay any outstanding financial obligations.
Title: FBI Changes Policy for Notifying States of Hacked Election Systems
Url: https://www.wsj.com/articles/fbi-changes-policy-for-notifying-states-of-election-systems-cyber-breaches-11579203014
Abstract: After criticism that it wasn’t doing enough to inform states of election threats, the FBI will notify state officials when local election systems are believed to have been breached by hackers.
Title: Amazon Sought $1 Billion in Incentives on Top of Lures for HQ2
Url: https://www.wsj.com/articles/amazon-sought-1-billion-in-incentives-on-top-of-lures-for-hq2-11579179601
Abstract: As Amazon began a search for a second headquarters in 2017, and billions in economic incentives to go with it, CEO Bezos and his top lieutenants set another goal: to secure an additional $1 billion of economic incentives for other real-estate projects.
Title: PPG Paints Dim Picture for 2020
Url: https://www.wsj.com/articles/industrial-paint-maker-ppg-warns-of-uncertainty-in-year-ahead-11579178872
Abstract: The paint maker said its sales this year would be hurt by weak industrial demand in the U.S. and Europe, as manufacturers confront global trade tensions and a production drop at Boeing.
Title: White House Releases Updated Guidance on School Prayer
Url: https://www.wsj.com/articles/white-house-to-release-updated-guidance-on-school-prayer-11579183629
Abstract: The White House released fresh federal guidance on prayer in public schools, clarifying that states must report to the federal government complaints or lawsuits claiming students were denied the right to prayer in schools.
Title: U.S.-China Deal Could Upend the Way Nations Settle Disputes
